SqlFileStream.summary: Exposes SQL Server data that is stored as a DATETIME2.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime2> class is used to work with `DATETIME2` data. `DATETIME2`has a wider range than DATETIME and thus needs its own type.

ctor1.param: Whether or not this instance should be considered null - true means null, false not null
ctor1.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct. Will initialize the datetime value to 0.

ctor2.param: Number of ticks to initialize this instance with - in the range of &
ctor2.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
ctor2.exception: is not in the range of &

Value.summary: Gets the representation of this instance.

Null.summary: Gets an instance representing the value NULL from the database.

OperatorDateTime.summary: Converts a DateTime into a SqlDateTime2

OperatorDBNull.summary: Converts a DBNull instance into a Null SqlDateTime2

OperatorSqlDateTime.exception: If the SqlDateTime2 instance has a null value
